replies.body: You can't really get RP on a regular basis for free since there is a real world currency amount tied to those points. The comments here are all correct about the Gift RP Art, and it is designed to give you a one-time boost to the next skin or item you need.

Hello Aztek I saw your question and I would like to inform you that it isn't possible unless you use hacks (don't do it, it is bannable and isn't fun for other people) or the safe way to do it is by doing Rp Art, you basically draw something or someone from league of legends and post it on the  help and support board, this is a once in a lifetime thing and you will not be able to do it again, but it is free Rp so yes it is possible to get free Rp, another way to get free Rp is by having someone gift you Rp, that would be free for you and not for the person doing it though :) Hopefully this answered your question,  have a great day {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Thanks a lot, one more question, how much Rp will i get with drawing?

It isn't that much RP it was designed for people who need like 14 rp to get a new skin but don't want to get another $5 worth of RP, the more pictures you make the more RP i know someone who made 4 pictures and got 40 RP, but remember you can only do it once so spend it wisely, a good place to make it would be in some like paint, photoshop or Rpart.riotgames.com So Good Luck :)
